item.title: Grid scripting in python
item.description: Scripting Grid management using LCG and LFC python APIs lcg-util Man pages are present in the the lcg-util-devel package. man lcg_util_python man lcg_del_python lfc-python Man pages are present in the lfc-python package. man lfc_python man lfc2_python Documentation Gilda Wiki LFC @ Sourcearchive
